Case# MPMovieRepeatMode.one

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case one
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieRepeatMode/one#Discussion)

The current movie is repeated when it finishes.
